nodes.text: The M4-1S astromech droid was a type of astromech droid available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

The M4-1S Astromech Droid was a gift given to all players through their mailbox in Star Wars: The Old Republic as a gift for Star Wars Day starting on May 4, 2015. It was first announced in a livestream centered on Game Update 3.2.
